content:
0, 2016
												Sorry to the developer, but this game is just garbage (and to be fair I doubt he/she spent much longer developing it than I spent playing it).  The physics are terrible - no matter which direction you turn, the ball always points in the same direction, the ball floats through the air no matter what, and it doesn't even attempt things like requiring a spiral.  Plus, it's buggy.  If you bring your arm back too far for your throw, you automatically drop it.  Really, really bad.  I wasted my dollar, but nobody else should.
